mapper.subject: Confirm Your Subscription to X Service
mapper.html:
Hi {{2.name}},

You're almost done! To activate your subscription to **SERVICE NAME**, please click the link below to approve it securely through PayPal:

Click here to approve your subscription

Once approved, your subscription will start automatically based on the plan details you selected.

If you didn't request this subscription, you can safely ignore this message.


Thanks
